name: OpenOTP Authentication Plugin Magento
short_description:
This Plugin enables strong two factor authentication for admins and users. It displays an overlay on Challenge-Response session, after fill in username and password. The plugin manage auto-create mode for local account on first login. The plugin will transparently handle any OpenOTP Login Mode including, LDAP only, OTP only and LDAP+OTP.

OpenOTP is the RCDevs user authentication solution. OpenOTP is a server application which provides multiple (highly configurable) authentication schemes for your LDAP users, based on one-time passwords (OTP) technologies and including: - OATH HOTP/TOTP/OCRA Software/Hardware Tokens - Google Authenticator - Mobile-OTP (mOTP) Software Tokens - SMS One-Time Passwords - Mail / Secure Mail One-Time Passwords - Yubikey

OpenOTP provides both SOAP/XML and RADIUS client APIs.
summary: OpenOTP authentication native plugin for Magento
